These shoes came in the exact color shown and fit my guys foot perfectly! He says they are comfortable and not too tight on his toes or ankle. He purchased a size 11 and his sneaker size is 10.5. Good fit. He loves the style of them and the price was decent compared to dress stores.
Stylish

The color is exactly as it appears in the pictures. The fit is pretty true to size, although we ordered a half size up just to be sure. My husband said they were extremely comfortable and he got so many compliments on the shoes.
My son wore these to prom and according to him he got tons of compliments. They were comfy (they did a ton of walking downtown that night) and good quality for the price. Fit true to size.

I bought them for my husband who also loves their appearance and says they are comfortable on his feet. He particularly likes how they complement his black tie look at events. They have a great design and appear to be very sturdy and durable, which makes me happy because it suggests they'll last a while.  Overall, this was a good value and a great looking shoe.

评论概述: Comfortable, supportive and attractive designer smoking slipper!
评论详情: I liked the REIHUANNE Men's Penny Slip-on Velvet Loafer Suede Dress Shoes because they are a comfortable, supportive and attractive designer smoking slipper. These designer slippers are imported with the sole material rubber while the outer material is 100% Velvet. The closure type is a pull-on and these slippers are true to size. The only drawback is the price--it's a little high and that's why I gave this product four stars instead of five. I recommend them because they are well made--four stars!
Held up in the rain!! Color was true to picture, fit was good. Lightweight  and easy to wear.
This shoe is great, it is about a whole size bigger than it says. I can only go down a half size for my son since 7.5 is the smallest available instead of the really big 8.
This is a nice pair of shoes. They look great and are very soft to the touch. Easy to clean, too. They are also quite comfortable to wear. 10/10
The fit was very tight and only lasted one night before the sole separated from the shoe.
These shoes are so much better then I thought they would be. They are comfortable and look amazing! They are well made! If you are thinking about ordering them.... Do it!

These shoes are very dressy.  They're perfect to wear to a wedding or party.  They fit well and are comfortable.  It's always good to have one pair of fancy dress shoes.

These REIHUANNE shoes have a great design, comfortable, stylish, awsome cushioning and fits just right. I love the fact that I can either wear them for any occasions. These shoes are so nice. True to size. Great material and fit. Comfortable to wear. The only negative to these shoes is the smell. So maybe air these out before wearing them.

These slippers are great, When I get out of bed, I put these on to get my coffee. No more cold floors!!! 评论概述: Perfect pair of dressy shoe for men
评论详情: I bought this pair for my husband to wear to a wedding reception and he absolutely loved it! These have an excellent non-slip rubber sole, which is uncommon in elegant men's shoes.  Also, the inside is beautifully cushioned, making it extremely comfortable for him.  The diamond design is quite fashionable, and he received numerous praises on these shoes!

评论概述: Ladies with large feet- these work for us too
评论详情: I wear a woman's 11w. I ordered size 9.5 in the purple color, and they fit perfectly.  These are a great substitute for Birdies fancy dress slippers/ shoes. I gave up on wearing heels 10 years ago  as I am too old to put up with having sore feet all night just to look good. You know how hard it is to find dressy flats, and its even harder when " your feets too big" [as the great old song goes]. Besides looking nice and being comfortable- these shoes actually have a real, practical sole that you can wear even if its wet or you need to walk a half mile from the parking garage. I don't know why women's flat shoes have such pathetic soles, but these are definitely going to hold up for multiple wears. They don't look masculine, the toe is tapered a bit, so the style is really unisex IMO. I highly recommend these shoes.

I normally where anywhere from a 9-1/2 to a 10 and the 10 fits just right. After a day of wearing these around I can say these are pretty comfy. And super snazzy too. The purple is super fun. And drew complements for me all day. This is one of those things where it’s hard to find the right outfit to match these with, but when it works, it works super well. They seem super high quality too. Over all I’d recommend these!

I purchased the size 9.5 and it fits my size 11 woman’s foot great, I sometimes wear a woman’s 11.5, as woman’s shoes can be a smidge too narrow, but this is the perfect width. I still have space at the end where my toes are, the shoe is a bit pointed in shape there so it works. It is hard to find women’s shoes in larger sizes, but this shoe is unisex and super stylish. The heel is very low, which I like as I’m tall. I got the black, crushed velvet and it is so cool looking, I love the tiny cat medallion, it is just the right amount of flare without being too much. These shoes do not slip and have great traction. They can be dressed up or down, I am really happy with these and would purchase them again.  They do have a slight plastic odor to them which is fading with wear.

评论概述: A nice looking and comfortable shoe
评论详情: I got the burgundy slippers with the quilted pattern look and the smaller charm on the vamp. Everything about this shoe is way outside my usual style, but I wanted something that would stand out and pair well with a suit I'm wearing to a Christmas party. When I saw these shoes, I know I had found exactly what I was looking for. The shoes are very comfortable, no question about that. However, I could feel either stitching or something else from the construction of the shoe but nothing that made the shoe uncomfortable. I've worn them with and without socks and had no issues. I haven't worn them when it was raining or any other similar weather so I don't know how they would do in that kind of environment. The rubber sole has good traction, which is something I like. I don't know if part of wearing dress shoes is showing the world how nimble you are by trying not to fall when you slip and slide everywhere you go, but that's not an issue with these shoes. The material of the shoe is very pliable which means to me that they could lose their shape after wearing them a while as opposed to a stiffer construction, but you might lose some of the comfort if that were the case. All in all I like the shoes and have no regrets.

评论概述: Very nice looking on the foot and really comfy after a full day's wear
评论详情: The suede is super soft giving a nice dressier look when worn with slacks for business casual attire. The gold emblem is a nice added touch and small enough to not take away from the rest or the shoe! Insoles are cushioned well giving comfort after all day wear. No rubbing on heels or elsewhere noted. Highly recommend to compliment your dressier wardrobe!

评论概述: I got so many compliments in a day!!

These are definitely a show stopper. I had coworkers coming from the other side of the building to check these shoes out! These make that statement you're going for.  Ready for the best part....? THEY'RE ACTUALLY VERY, VERY COMFORTABLE!!! I wore them for about 9-10 hours straight. My feet were comfortable all day and weren't sore the next day.  Very impressed with the quality of this product. Honestly, these product pictures don't do them justice.  As a reviewer, you've sold me on purchasing other colors of these! I've got my eyes on those purple ones! 💜  Not just a fantastic product, but a fantastic show. Shoe sizes are very accurate for me! Great shoes! Will be making my own purchase very soon!
These fit perfectly. They look awesome. Seems to be built well too. Only wore them for about 3 hours last night, but they where comfortable during that time. I would recommend

I recently ordered these slip-on velvet dress shoes for an upcoming cruise next year to wear on the two formal nights.  I must say I am thoroughly impressed with both the design and comfort of the loafers.  I have a large foot (size 13) and a high in-step, so I was somewhat skeptical that I would even be able to get the shoes on my feet.  Both feet fit great.One of the standout features of these shoes is their comfort. The interior is well-padded, providing excellent support.  The sizing was accurate, and the shoes fit true to size. The quality of the materials used is apparent and the sole has a good grip for walking on different surfaces.  Although there is a weird tire smell that will hopefully dissipate over time.  Maybe the soles were made from recycled tires.I don't plan to wear these more than a couple of hours each of the formal nights.  The price point may be slightly higher than some other options on the market, but I think that the combination of style, comfort, and quality justifies the price.  My main issues are the smell and also the very low in-step that has creased already.  I tried to capture that in the picture that I've attached.  But this could really just be a result from my feet having a really high in-step.Overall,  I think these shoes are an excellent choice is you need something  formal for an event or seeking to add a touch of luxury to your formal attire.  I recommend these shoes.
These are very nice! Comfortable for even a extra extra wide foot! (Normally wear EEEE!)  Easy to put on and take off. So fancy!

评论概述: wow what a great shoe experience- this is an instant favorite
评论详情: The past two years has led me to realize my favorite kind of dress shoe is the fancy loafer style. I am referring to the type of loafer that does not look like the old school loafers, but more like an enhanced driving shoe/leisure shoe. I am not sure what i mean exactly by leisure shoe other than to pair that term with a type of shoe that would be worn with a nice smoking jacket. This eye catching loafer style dress shoe from the Reihuanne brand, i have located an instant favorite in my shoe collection. This shoe looks as comfortable as it feels in that it like a giant pillow for the feet in how kind they are to them. I work out six days a week with two being intensive dancing and the other days jogging so a comfortable shoe like this is so great to com across. This is the definition of a five star shoe. Everything about this shoe is perfect from the eye catching velvet like material to the diamond pattern stitching. Being that i am an animal lover and more specifically a cat person i was pleasantly surprised to see a feline decal pendent on the front of each of these shoes. This cat looking metal pendent looks like a jaguar or something similar. That is the perfect touch to add tot he silky velvet of the dominant red color. The boarder lining around the open region of the shoe is even classy looking. I love how these fit perfectly which is not always the case with loafer style dress shoes. Often i find myself having to jump up or down a size with loafers but this brands twelve fits like a size twelve should. There is no extra room in the back, therefore giving my feet the best balance of comfort that can have inside a shoe. To conclude, i am super happy with these shoes and recommend them.

评论概述: Fits ok, smells a lot like its' manufacturing process
评论详情: These slippers look like the listing, so that's good. They smell very much like a tire plant, hopefully the off-gassing will dissipate. The size is fine, but they weirdly feel a little too small AND a little too big. I think it's because they are a little wide, but just long enough, so the toes get squished. However, I don't think a size up would fit better. Not a shoe I would wear every day, but for occasional use, they are fine.

I recently got the REIHUANNE Loafers, and I couldn't be more delighted with my purchase. The blend of vintage charm and contemporary style in these black loafers is truly captivating. The high-quality crushed velvet material not only feels luxuriously soft but also exudes a timeless elegance, accentuated by the designer gold-toned buckle at the vamp.  What sets these loafers apart is the commitment to comfort. The quality rubber sole provides superior cushioning and arch support, making each step a pleasure. The non-slip feature ensures a secure grip on any surface, allowing me to confidently navigate various terrains.  The well-constructed design and slip-on functionality make these loafers not only stylish but also incredibly convenient. They are ready to wear straight out of the box, adding a touch of sophistication to any occasion. The easy maintenance – just a simple dry clean with a soft brush – adds to the appeal, making them perfect for formal events like weddings, proms, or even a night out on the town.  What truly stood out to me was the brand's commitment to customer satisfaction. The assurance to choose my regular size and the offer for after-sales support demonstrated a genuine dedication to ensuring a positive shopping experience. REIHUANNE has indeed created a product that combines style, comfort, and excellent customer service. I highly recommend these loafers for anyone looking to effortlessly blend manly sophistication with a touch of glamour.
